summary: This document contains due diligence research results for Southern Trust Company, Inc., focusing on compliance with AML standards. It includes findings from various databases regarding negative media, court cases, and other relevant information, indicating no significant alerts or negative findings related to the company.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report for Southern Trust Company, Inc. conducted by Vikram-D Singh.
No significant negative media or alerts were found regarding Southern Trust Company, Inc.
A tender notice was published by Southern Trust Company, Inc. on January 3, 2017, for various office supplies and services.
Lucas Pascal is the contact person listed for the tender notice.
The report indicates that all searches returned no alerts or negative findings.
